Question: Gargan later founded "Throw the Hypocritical Rascals Out" (THRO), which this person supported.
Hints: At one point in June, this person led the polls with 39% (versus 31% for Bush and 25% for Clinton).
In 2012, this person endorsed Mitt Romney for President.
This person denounced Congress for its inaction in his speech at the National Press Club in Washington, D.C., on March 18, 1992.
